span.span: AVOYELLES PUBLIC
CHARTER SCHOOL​
Click on the link below to go to the Parent Page for more information.

span.span: Seniors

Online classes begin on Monday, March 23, 2020. Students will receive an email invitation from their DE/Regular Ed. teacher by noon on March 23rd to join the class. If for some reason students don't receive an email invite by noon, please email the subject teacher or julieroy@apcs.us.
Online classes will consist of Math, English, Science and History. Electives will be enrichment only and available on apcs.us.

All 4th nine-week class requirements will be assigned online, graded online and credits will be applied to meet graduation requirements. Should classes resume on April 13th, classroom instruction will resume.
Please explore the Google Classroom Guide above.

span.span: 11th Grade Dual Enrollment

Online DE Classes: Online classes begin on Monday, March 23, 2020. Students will receive an email invitation from their DE teacher by noon on March 23rd to join the class. If for some reason students don't receive an email invite by noon, please email the subject teacher or julieroy@apcs.us.
Should classes resume on April 13th, classroom instruction will resume.
Please explore the Google Classroom Guide above.

span.span: 9th-11th Grade
March 23-April 12:

Enrichment activities will be posted by Wednesday, March 25, 2020. Students are encouraged to engage in activities offered by teachers and to READ!! Learn something new, plant a garden, get to know your family better, take a break from technology. (phones and video games)
Walk barefoot in the grass!
April 13: If the Louisiana Dept. of Education allows schools to re-open on April 13th, classes will resume at APCS.

* Please note: If schools are required to close for the remainder of the 2019-2020 school year, 9th-11th grade students will begin online classes utilizing Google Classroom in core subjects. (Math, Science, History, English) These classes will begin on April 13th.

Students will receive an email invitation from their subject teacher to join the online class. Updates will be posted as well as additional guidance as things unfold. If you have any questions or concerns, please contact dodicarrier@apcs.us. ginabertalotto@apcs.us, lorithames@apcs.us or julieroy@apcs.us.
The ultimate goal in mind for the high school students is for students to complete the school year in time for them to be able to work their summer jobs.

span.span: K-8th Grades
March 23rd-April 13th:

While awaiting a ruling on the Louisiana Department of Education on the re-opening of schools for the 2019-2020 school year, K-8th grade teachers will be sharing enrichment activities for students to utilize on apcs.us. We strongly encourage families to interact with each other during this time which is why we are only promoting ENRICHMENT activities.

Enrichment activities will be posted by Wednesday, March 25, 2020. Students are encouraged to engage in activities offered by teachers and to READ!! Learn something new, plant a garden, get to know your family better, take a break from technology. (phones and video games)
Walk barefoot in the grass!

We are hoping that school will resume on April 13th but if schools are not allowed to re-open for the 2019-2020 school year, we have plans in place for our K-8th grade students to complete their academics. Once we are notified by the LDOE, we will update information here.
